subject: [R] How to draw several ROC curves on a common graph
body:
>library(ROCR)

>plot(roc1)
>plot(roc2)

gives two plots on two different graph. Now i want to merge on a single
graph. 

>plot(roc1)
>points(roc2)
   Error in as.vector(x, "double") : cannot coerce to vector

any solution?
--
